http://sites.simbla.com/871f3a54-3131-b616-e5df-b781f31a0a3a/iusee

　　Four teenagers on a road trip decide to take a detour and find themselves at a haunted house Halloween scream park deep in the woods of southern Kentucky.After witnessing an assortment of torture and gore, they start wondering if what they are experiencing isn’t a little too realistic. Before they know it, each one of them is captured and made part of the horrific attraction they originally thought was all gruesome fun and games…
